oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Analogues of a Fibonacci-Lucas Identity
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bhatnagar, Gaurav
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Combinatorics
11B39
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sury's 2014 proof of an identity for Fibonacci and Lucas numbers (Identity 236 of Benjamin and Quinn's 2003 book: {\em Proofs that count: The art of combinatorial proof}) has excited a lot of comment. We give an alternate, telescoping, proof of this---and associated---identities and generalize them. We also give analogous identities for other sequences that satisfy a three-term recurrence relation.
Comment: 6 pages, final version, some typos fixed
